title: Can't Login
body:
First time I try to login, says there's a problem.

Second time, says there's a queue for 1 person and to wait one. And then it just sits at 'authenticating' for... a long time.

Before this occurred, my client went all bonkers on me. Very laggy, so I tried logging out. Not sure what to think. Seems serverside.

Anyone else experiencing this issue?

replies.body: Hey, I'm seeing a flood of threads on this now.  Our network team is aware and looking into it now.  Hang tight!
How long will the process will take?

Thank you!

{{sticker:sg-lux}}

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BRppNTB7,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-11-16T19:47:42.650+0000)
>
> Hey, I'm seeing a flood of threads on this now.  Our network team is aware and looking into it now.  Hang tight!

Thank you so much for the response. Glad to see you guys on the issue so promptly. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yes.
Im having the same problem
Yup.
Here here
Same
Yeah
Same here...

I've got a pinned thread now for updates, and we have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Currently NA, OCE, and PBE are experiencing service issues.  We're checking it out, and will post updates there.

Network Operations – a few seconds ago
We're aware of a problem causing login attempts to fail, and are working on a fix.

Source: Riot
still cant login
It appears to be up and running again. I know I am
I've been having the same issue for the past hour but, just now i was able to log in so hopefully it works for you now
bless that i typed league of legends and saw this, thought my client wasn't working{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Since I tried logging in on my phone I thought I was banned and it scared the hell out of me lol
{{summoner:3}}

Yeah, the exact same problem sequence, fix it Rito, fix it fix it
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
